word: IT IS OBVIOUS FROM A STUDY OF HISTORY THAT NOT ALL REVIVALS ARE GOD-INSPIRED. COUNTERFEITS HAVE APPEARED EVERY TIME THERE HAS BEEN THE GENUINE. THE BIBLE TELLS US THAT SATAN CAN AND DOES PERFORM MIRACLES. HE WOULD, IF POSSIBLE, DECEIVE THE VERY ELECT. WE WILL NOT ALWAYS BE ABLE TO TRUST WHAT WE SEE AND HEAR AND FEEL.
